meanings.definition: Tubulates: to form or become tubular in shape
meanings.sent1: The plant tubulates as it grows taller and taller.
meanings.sent2: The straw tubulates when you blow air through it.
meanings.sent3: The balloon tubulates when you squeeze it too hard!
meanings.sent4: The river tubulates through the valley, carving its path.
meanings.sent5: The worm tubulates through the soil, creating tunnels.

meanings.definition: Tubulates: having a tubular structure or shape
meanings.sent1: The tubulates pipe carried water to the house.
meanings.sent2: The telescope has a tubulates design for viewing distant objects.
meanings.sent3: The tubulates straw made drinking soda more fun.
meanings.sent4: The tubulates tunnel was dark and echoey.
meanings.sent5: The tubulates pasta was perfect for holding sauce.
